Title: Relates to the issuance of an order of protection in a child protective proceeding against a parent of a child when such parent is found to have severely abused another child
Summary: Authorizes the issuance of an order of protection in a child protective proceeding against a parent of a child when such parent is found to have severely abused another child.
LawCode: Amd ยง1056, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to the issuance of orders of protection in child protective proceedings
